form.name: EditRecruitmentPlan
form.default-table-style: ofx-scroll table table-striped table-hover table-bordered dataTable

textarea.visual-editor-buttons: formatblock newline bold italic underline left center right number bullet indent outdent undo redo color hilite rule link image table clean html spellcheck

set.value: ${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilDateTime; return UtilDateTime.getMonthStart(nowTimestamp, timeZone, locale);}
${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilDateTime; return UtilDateTime.getMonthEnd(nowTimestamp, timeZone, locale);}

${groovy: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilDateTime; return UtilDateTime.getMonthEnd(nowTimestamp, timeZone, locale);}
